quote: Eine Rose ist eine Rose ist eine Rose.
author: Helge Schneider

quote: Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.
author: Getrude Stein

quote: Hey Du! Pssssst. Willst du ein ,S' kaufen? Genauuuu..
author: Schlemihl

quote: I want you to act as you would in a crisis. I want you to act as if our house is on fire. Because it is.
author: Greta Thunberg

quote: The creatures outside looked from pig to man, and from man to pig, and from pig to man again; but already it was impossible to say which was which.
author: George Orwell

quote: Imagine all the people - Living life in peace.
author: John Lennon
